Title: WPF Gradient Control

HomeWiki:
Project Description



WPF Gradient Control

Gradient brush control is a brush selector control which will help the user to create gradient brush through UI. A User interface which will help the user to create linear or radial Brush.

 

The main feature of this project is:

   * Color selector: A color selector through color can be selected.

   * Gradient Point selector: The user interface has the facility to select the start point and end point for Linear brush. And center point and origin point for radial brush.

   * Gradient stop add: Through the user interface user can add gradient stop in particular offset.
